about.title: About StepUp Shoes
about.description: StepUp Shoes is a modern store for stylish footwear that combines comfort and quality.
about.text1: We offer a wide selection of shoes for men, women, and children from leading global brands.
about.text2: Our goal is to make shoe shopping convenient and enjoyable by providing the best service and reliable delivery.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.text1: Delivery across Kazakhstan within 2-5 business days.
delivery.text2: Courier delivery or pickup from collection points.
delivery.text4: Express delivery available (1 day, for an additional fee).
delivery.text5: After placing your order, you will receive an SMS and email with a tracking number.

returns.title: Returns and Exchanges
returns.text1: Returns are possible within 14 days of receipt.
returns.text2: Items must be in original packaging with no signs of wear.
returns.text3: Refunds are issued using the same payment method.
returns.text4: To process a return, contact us by email:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Privacy policy for StepUp Shoes website

section1.title: Information We Collect
section1.text: We collect personal information that you provide when registering, placing orders, or communicating with us. This includes your name, email address, phone number, delivery address, and payment information.

section2.title: How We Use Your Information
section2.item2: Communicating about your orders and our services

section3.title: Data Protection
section3.text: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. Your payment data is processed securely through trusted payment providers.

section4.title: Cookies
section4.text: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience and analyze website traffic. You can control cookie settings in your browser.

section5.title: Contact Us
section5.text: If you have questions about our privacy policy, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms of service for StepUp Shoes website

section1.title: General Provisions
section1.text: By using our website and services, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully before making a purchase.

section2.title: Orders and Payment
section2.text: All prices are in KZT and include VAT. Payment can be made by card or cash on delivery (where available). Orders are confirmed after payment is received.

section3.title: Delivery
section3.item1: Delivery takes 2-5 business days within Kazakhstan
section3.item2: Shipping costs depend on your location and order total

section4.title: Returns and Refunds
section4.text: You can return items within 14 days of receipt. Items must be unworn and in original packaging. Refunds are processed using the original payment method.

section5.title: Liability
section5.text: We are not responsible for delays caused by courier services or force majeure circumstances.
